Happy Black Friday shopping everyone!

Three months have passed since posting [our first (and so far only) offer on this forum](https://talk.lowendspirit.com/discussion/1739) and in the spirit of the day: we are back with another limited deal! The following offer is a **recurring discount** for the KVM Server S package and is **limited to the first 20 orders**.

&nbsp;

**20 € per year (excl. VAT) for…**
✓ **2 GB** DDR4 ECC Memory
✓ **1 vCore** Intel® Xeon® Processor
✓ **20 GB** SSD Storage (RAID 10)
✓ **1.000 Mb/s** Up- and Downlink
✓ Powered by KVM & Proxmox
✓ 1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6 included
✓ 5 TB Monthly Unthrottled Bandwidth

[[[ ORDER NOW ]]](https://www.alwyzon.com/get/bfriday20 "[[ ORDER NOW ]]")
Coupon: **BFRIDAY20**

&nbsp;

Not enough for your next project? No problem, just get double the resources (4 GB RAM, 2 vCores and 40 GB SSD) for 40 € per year with the coupon [**BFRIDAY20x2**](https://www.alwyzon.com/get/bfriday20x2 "BFRIDAY20x2") instead.

>! **40 € per year (excl. VAT) for…**
>! ✓ **4 GB** DDR4 ECC Memory
>! ✓ **2 vCore** Intel® Xeon® Processor
>! ✓ **40 GB** SSD Storage (RAID 10)
>! ✓ **1.000 Mb/s** Up- and Downlink
>! ✓ Powered by KVM & Proxmox
>! ✓ 1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6 included
>! ✓ 5 TB Monthly Unthrottled Bandwidth
>! 
>! [[[ ORDER NOW ]]](https://www.alwyzon.com/get/bfriday20x2 "[[ ORDER NOW ]]")
>! Coupon: **BFRIDAY20x2**

&nbsp;

To redeem any of those two offers, use the above order link or manually enter the coupon code. Prices are exclusive of VAT. If you are located inside the European Union, your local VAT rate will be added during the checkout.

&nbsp;

## Key Features
✓ Instant provisioning of new servers
✓ Powered by Proxmox and KVM
✓ Easy to use client area
✓ Reboot, reinstall and VNC console available in client area
✓ Reverse DNS configurable over client area too
✓ CentOS. Debian, Fedora, openSUSE or Ubuntu pre-installed
✓ Or: upload and install your own ISOs in the client area
✓ Enterprise-grade hardware from major brands
✓ Reliable Dutch datacenter in Apeldoorn (Tier 3)
✓ 10 Gb/s network links on each node server
✓ Fully redundant, UPS-backed power supply (2N+1)
✓ Generators with initial autonomy of 48 hours

&nbsp;

## About Alwyzon
[Alwyzon](https://www.alwyzon.com/), is a trading name of Hohl IT e.U., a small software development company registered in Graz, Austria. All equipment is fully owned by us and solely consists of reliable, enterprise-grade hardware (Dell PowerEdge R630s) colocated in a Dutch datacenter in Apeldoorn, about 50 km to the German border and thus located rather centrally in Western Europe. As a RIPE NCC member, we also own all IPs assigned to any client.

&nbsp;

## Our Network
* Looking Glass: https://lg.alwyzon.com
* Test IPv4: 31.14.17.6
* Test IPv6: 2a0d:f301::6
* Test Download File: [25 MB](https://lg.alwyzon.com/25MB.test) [50 MB](https://lg.alwyzon.com/50MB.test) [100 MB](https://lg.alwyzon.com/100MB.test)

&nbsp;

## Frequently Asked Questions

**What payment methods do you support?**
We do support Credit Cards (processed by Stripe*), BanContact, EPS, giropay, iDeal and Paypal. If none of these payment methods is applicable to you, you might also pay via SEPA wire transfer, but you will need to open a ticket for that.

*We know your credit card information is very sensitive and thus we will never store your credit card details on our servers. Instead, those are handled by the payment processor Stripe and we only store a token and the last four digits for later reference.

**How long until my virtual server is ready to use?**
Provisioning of new virtual servers is fully automated and takes about 5 minutes. As soon as we receive your payment, the setup process is automatically launched for the operating system you selected in the checkout form. (Provided that our system didn't flag you as potential fraud.)

**What kinds of usages are accepted?**
We accept almost every form of usage that does not make excessive use of our hardware and network, and is not consider illegal in Austria or the Netherlands. In addition, public VPNs, Tor nodes and anything Torrent related is forbidden. For a more detailed list, see the “Accepted Usage Policy” section of our [Terms of Service](https://www.alwyzon.com/terms).

**Which operating systems are supported?**
We can provide you with the latest CentOS, Debian, Fedora, openSuse and Ubuntu releases pre-installed on your virtual server; or you can upload any ISO and install whatever operating system you would like to use.

**What level of support is provided?**
These are unmanaged virtual server offers, so you are expected to install and configure the server yourself. We give you root access to the virtual server, but you will have to setup any software according to your requirements.

**Can I have a benchmark?**
Yes, of course; we are on LES after all. :)
